checkout.contactInfoHint: Specify where the renter can pick up the items and who to contact
checkout.otherCardHint: You'll enter card details on the bank's secure page.

success.title: Payment Successful
success.message: Thank you for your purchase! Your payment has been processed successfully.

error.title: Payment Failed
error.generic: We couldn't process your payment. Please try again or use a different payment method.
error.card_declined: Your card was declined. Please try another payment method.
error.insufficient_funds: Insufficient funds. Please try a different payment method.
error.expired_card: The card has expired. Please use a different payment method.
error.invalid_card: The card details are invalid. Please check and try again.
error.processing_error: There was an error processing your payment. Please try again.
